attributes.action: investigate the death toll and the lasting damage caused by statin prescriptions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The developed world has seen a large numbers of cases of iatrogenic statin damage (all documented in peer-reviewed medical literature, including the highly respected Lancet and BMJ) Statins need to be investigated by impartial observers to determine the risks of statin usage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
